item.description:
Latin Grammy-winning band Bajofondo is a high-energy tour de force that blends Argentina’s tango, Uruguay's milonga, rock, hip-hop, electronica, jazz, classical and a world of sounds from the Rio de la Plata. Bajofondo began as a one-off diversion in the studio for film composer Gustavo Santaolalla, who has won 11 Grammys and two Academy Awards for his original compositions created for The Motorcycle Diaries, Brokeback Mountain, 21 Grams and Babel. Bajofondo is touring in support of its new recording, Presente, released on Sony Masterworks.

Any fans of the Tango Fusion / Tango Chill genre (as I am) should love this one! Plus it's a chance to see a Latin Grammy winner!

Get tickets ($20) here:
http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/01004A4BBFDDC429?c=rmk-lnneweng_web_bajofondo_dise_021513

 

Watch/Listen to a few songs here:

http://www.worldmusic.org/bajofondo-4-988

http://www.facebook.com/bajofondo

We'll meetup in the Paradise Lounge before the show, starting at 8pm. Doors open at 8pm, the show starts at 9 pm...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

http://www.atlas-soul.com

http://www.facebook.com/atlassoul

 

Atlas Soul is an award-winning band performing original music that celebrates very spicy Afro-Mediterranean music and rhythm with a hot dose of Jazz and Funk.

"Atlas Soul's blend of jazz, funk and Middle-Eastern/Arabic grooves is a fascinating sonic stew that will catch any listener's ear. This is their second appearance on our CD's compilation. We like'em, and you will too".  Global Rhythm Magazine

Burning live performances are their trade mark! They have toured and played countless prestigious venues in the US and abroad.

Atlas Soul's songs are in French, Italian, Arabic, Hebrew and English, a truly cross-cultural musical experience. The lyrics speak of love, ecology, oppression, happiness, poverty, and the melancholy of being an immigrant.

Their motto is "World Music for World Peace."

Philosophically and politically, Atlas Soul hopes to inspire world peace through a fusion of music and culture that gets people to the dance floor.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Paradise Cafe/Lounge area (to the left as you enter). Look for me by the bar.
item.name: Bajofondo with Atlas Soul
